overview: The Stage of Evil Spirit: A drama club in an university is running a drama for the graduate ceremony. The producer Ki was picked Sha Yan as the main actress, Ki's sister Yu Mei was angry about play the role as a side actress. When the rehearsal starts, some strange happens, it makes Sha want to quit this role. At the mean time Yu was dead, Ki thought that Professor Wong might know something about the issue and he found out a girl was dead while acting this drama, afterward whoever plays this role will die...
title: City Horror: The Stage Of Evil Spirit
